entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 60 to 80 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, with possible thunderstorms. Peak intensities of 15 to 20 mm/h. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Upgraded to an Orange Warning.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms. Amounts may approach warning criteria, mostly about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain. Isolated areas, especially about the highest ranges, may exceed warning criteria. Note, another period of heavy rain is likely on Thursday morning and a Warning for this may be issued closer to the time. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
